availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Patrick White, Sr. (Hamilton County, Ohio, tailor)

body.p: Hamilton County, Ohio, tailor. Native of Ireland. Married to Nancy White. Father of Patrick White and James White. Tailor in Hamilton County, Ohio, in 1850. Tailor in Hamilton County in 1860. Tailor in Hamilton County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati, Ward 4, p. 199A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati, Ward 3, p. 180.
Williams' Cincinnati Directory for 1864 (Cincinnati: Williams & Co., 1864), 375.
